thread.title: Wenger says Arsenal job "a great privilege" as he prepares for final farewell against Huddersfield

title: Wenger says Arsenal job "a great privilege" as he prepares for final farewell against Huddersfield
text:
Wenger says Arsenal job "a great privilege" 10:23am BST - 01:14
Arsene Wenger says it's been a ''great privilege'' to manage Arsenal for 22 years as he prepares for his final game in charge away to Huddersfield on Sunday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Arsene Wenger says it's been a "great privilege" to manage Arsenal for 22 years as he prepares for his final game in charge away to Huddersfield on Sunday. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KQrQeC
